name: Ukiuki Tsuri Tengoku: Kawa Monogatari
overview: Uki Uki Tsuri Tengoku - Kawa Monogatari in the second game in the Teichiku fishing games for Playstation. Those games features fishing in islands. As a in the first game in the series the game uses the classic first person perspective. This time the game features 2 different game modes a story mode in which the player can try to catch fishes in different places of the island, watch animals in one part of the island and compete in fishing tournaments, the other game mode is free fishing in which the player select a fishing spot and try to catch fishes. The game features different fish species and fishing spots. The game features also a complete encyclopedia with a lot of different kind of fish species and recipes that are unlockables catching them in the story mode.
